name: Covid19 run!
description:
COVID19 RUN!

UPDATE V 0.5 (INDEV) :

1.FIX BUGS

2.MORE DIALOGUE

3.MORE ENEMY IN CHAPTER 1

BASIC CONTROL:

A = LEFT

D = RIGHT

E = PICKUP MASK/HAND SANITIZER

Space = JUMP

Left click = Throw mask (Boss fight only)

Right click = Throw sanitizer (Boss fight only)

C = Dash to the right (Level 11-14 only)

Z = Dash to the left (Level 11-14 only)

In this game, you need to collect all the mask and hand sanitizer in every level. If the amount of the hand sanitizer and mask does not meet the minimum requirement, then you can't proceed to the next level. To collect all the mask and hand sanitizer is not that easy, there's gonna be many obstacle like Spike or Covid-19 that you must avoid. Good luck and have fun!

ATTENTION! :
